text: In @holly_cummins' session at #YOWlondon about having fun in the workplace. It has ducks!

author.name: Daniel Terhorst-North
author.description: Started BDD, caused Cucumber. Optimizes orgs, teams, code. Coach, mentor, geek, mischief-maker. Christian, infrequent blogger. WWGH, https://t.co/rLgPMnJSX7
